mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))
    if len(s1) < 2 and len(s2) < 2:
        return False
    s1_list = sorted(list(s1))
    s2_list = sorted(list(s2))
    return s1_list == s2_list
